ARABIC: سُبْحَٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Glory be to your Lord, the Lord of Might, beyond anything they describe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Too glorious is your Lord, the Lord of power, for what they ascribe to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Exalted be your Lord, the Lord of Glory, above what they attribute to Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your Lord, the Lord of Honor, is too exalted to be considered as they describe Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Purity is to your Lord, the Lord of Honour, from all what they say.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Glorified be your Lord, the Lord of Al-`Izzah! (He is free) from what they attribute unto Him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Glory be to your Lord, the Lord of Honor, above what they describe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Glory be to thy Lord, the Lord of Glory, above that they describe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Glorified be thy Lord, the Lord of Majesty, from that which they attribute (unto Him)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Glory be to your Lord: the Lord of Glory is far above what they attribute to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hallowed be thine Lord, the Lord of Majesty, from that which they ascribe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Clear is your Lord, the Lord of Might, of whatever they allege [concerning Him].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Glory to thy Lord, the Lord of Honour and Power! (He is free) from what they ascribe (to Him)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Glorified be your Lord, the Lord of Honour and Power! (He is free) from what they attribute unto Him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Exaltations be to your Lord, the Lord of Might, above that they describe!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Exalted be your Lord, the Lord of Glory, beyond their allegations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:180] Glory be to your Lord, the Lord of Might, of Triumph, [exalted is He] above what they allege!, in the way of His having a child.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 519 (Glorified be thy Lord) Allah exonerated Himself from having a son or partner, (the Lord of Majesty) the Lord of might and power, (from that which they attribute (unto Him)) from the lies they invent about Him.
